name: Cheesy Parmesan Crusted Crescent Rolls
author: Stella Cheese
summary: Crescent rolls filled with mozzarella cheese are brushed with an herb-butter mixture, topped with grated Parmesan cheese, and baked until golden brown.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package refrigerated butter-flavored crescent rolls
¾ cup shredded Stella® mozzarella cheese
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees  F (205 degrees  C)
Grease a large baking sheet and set aside
Roll crescent rolls out, then divide and top Stella shredded mozzarella cheese among rolls
Gently roll crescents and place onto baking sheet
Whisk together butter, dried basil and dried oregano together in a small bowl
Brush mixture onto crescent rolls and top with Stella Parmesan cheese
Bake at 400 degrees  F (205 degrees  C) for 10 minutes or until lightly browned
